programme.desc: In 1948 London, Prince of Botswana Seretse Khama meets and falls in love with an office worker named Ruth Williams. Despite disapproval from both their families and governments, they get married and go to Botswana to help his people push for independence(n)

programme.title: Morgan
programme.desc: A corporate troubleshooter is sent to a top-secret location to investigate a terrifying incident with an experiment. She discovers that the experiment is a genetically-altered woman named Morgan. As she debates terminating the experiment, Morgan escapes(n)

programme.title: A Rising Tide
programme.desc: A man loses his family's restaurant during Hurricane Sandy forcing him to grow up quickly and take big risks in business and love(n)

programme.title: The Dressmaker
programme.desc: When she was a girl, Tilly was banished from her small town for witnessing a murder she has no memory of. After years working as a dressmaker in Paris, she returns. Transforming the women of the town with her dresses, she plans revenge on the town(n)

programme.title: Bridget Jones's Baby
programme.desc: After breaking up with Mark, Bridget decides to focus on her career and friends. She has everything under control until she meets a dashing American named Jack. Discovering she is pregnant, she realizes that the father could be either Mark or Jack(n)

programme.title: Home Again
programme.desc: After separating from her husband, a mother meets three aspiring filmmakers at a club who have nowhere to live. She invites them to live in her guest house and starts a romance with one of them, a situation that is complicated when her husband shows up(n)

programme.title: God's Own Country
programme.desc: After his father hires a migrant worker to help on the farm, a young man finds himself hating the newcomer. As the two spend more and more time together, their bond grows closer, and soon an intense and loving relationship ignites between them(n)
